title: What types of music was used in the movie Shawshank redemption? - Quora

response.answer_text: There were several songs of the times (1930's), some Hank Williams (library), the classical music (warden's office), a rock-and-roll riff (entrance of Tommy). The score was very sweeping; I really liked the piece that was played when Andy emerged from the pipe.  His new "birth" from a "river of sh*t" and that epic piece set the tone for the rest of the movie; knowing that "hope is a dangerous thing". I hope this is helpful!
